short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the background color of web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RGB Background Color Changer
Easily customize your browser’s look with the RGB Background Color Changer! This simple and intuitive extension allows you to set any webpage’s background color using the RGB color model. Just input your desired Red, Green, and Blue values, and instantly apply the changes. Whether you want a darker theme to reduce eye strain or a splash of color to brighten your browsing experience, this tool gives you full control over the aesthetics of your web environment.
